doctor.name: Dr. Md. Imtiajul Islam
doctor.workplace: Khwaja Yunus Ali Medical College & Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Imtiajul Islam is a Diabetes Specialist in Pabna. His qualification is MBBS, DEM (BIRDEM), MACE (USA). He is working as a Diabetes & Hormone Specialist doctor in Khwaja Yunus Ali Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Kimia Diagnostic Center, Pabna. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Imtiajul Islam at Kimia Diagnostic Center, Pabna is 2nd & 4th Sunday of Each Month (Call for time).

chamber.address: Pach Matha Mor, Beside Central Girls School, Shalgaria, Pabna
chamber.visitingTime: 2nd & 4th Sunday of Each Month (Call for time)

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Shahinur Rahman
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Shahinur Rahman is a Diabetes Specialist in Pabna. His qualification is MBBS (DU), PGD (Diabetology), CCD (BIRDEM), FACE (USA). He is a Assistant Registrar, Diabetes & Endocrinology at Pabna Diabetic Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Sahin Mohol. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Shahinur Rahman at Sahin Mohol is 8am to 6pm (Only Friday).
